title: Coronavirus leaves many study abroad students in limbo
description: Coronavirus has spread across 70 countries, prompting educational institutions around the world to postpone or cancel exchange programs. College students in Italy, France, Shanghai and Mauritius, explain how they are scrambling to make new plans.
content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
